name: Nutrient
description: Basic nutritional replacement for a single meal. The nutrient is stored in a disposable container as a slurry of protein, carbohydrate, and fats in a cocktail of vitamins and glucose. Quality is low. High quality versions, with better flavor or more desirable ingredient origins, cost more.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures
